name: Red Velvet
description: Red Velvet is known for their dual concept - 'Red' for energetic pop and 'Velvet' for smooth R&B - along with their unique vocals and artistic music videos.

funFacts: Considered one of the most beautiful K-Pop idols
Known for her elegant, ice princess image
Debuted at 23, one of the oldest debut ages
Very introverted and reserved
Her visuals have been called 'legendary'
members.bio: Irene is Red Velvet's leader and visual, often called the 'face genius.' Her elegant beauty and ice princess image are iconic. Despite her cold appearance, she's a caring leader who looks after members.

funFacts: Trained for 7 years at SM before debut
Known for her powerful dancing skills
Has a bear-like cute personality
Very hardworking and perfectionist
Has a successful solo career
members.bio: Seulgi is Red Velvet's main dancer and all-rounder who trained for 7 years. Her powerful dancing and bear-like personality are equally beloved. She's known as one of the best female dancers in K-Pop.

funFacts: Lived in Canada and USA, fluent in English
Known for her powerful, emotional vocals
Suffered a bad injury in 2019 but recovered
Very caring and maternal personality
Her high notes are legendary
members.bio: Wendy is Red Velvet's main vocalist with one of the most powerful voices in K-Pop. Having lived abroad, she's fluent in English. After recovering from a serious injury, she returned stronger than ever.

funFacts: Known for her bright, sunny personality
Has a successful acting career
The tallest member at 168cm
Her smile is considered her signature
Has released solo music
members.bio: Joy is Red Velvet's mood maker with a bright, sunny personality. Her acting career has been equally successful. Her genuine smile and tall figure make her stand out both on stage and screen.

funFacts: Added to Red Velvet in 2015 after debut
Known for her artistic Instagram aesthetic
Very creative and artistic personality
Has done various solo activities
Her quirky personality is loved by fans
members.bio: Yeri is Red Velvet's maknae who joined in 2015. Her artistic Instagram and quirky personality have earned her a dedicated fanbase. She brings youthful energy and creativity to the group.

seo.title: Red Velvet Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with ReVeluv
seo.description: Create your Red Velvet name with Irene, Seulgi, Wendy, Joy & Yeri! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for ReVeluv.
